content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam, I'm glad you're interested in the apartment. Let's start negotiating the rental price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: The apartment is in a great location in the city center, and it's a high-quality build. Therefore, I think a price of 1,200 Euro per month is reasonable.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's too low for me. I'm looking for a higher price, considering the apartment's location and quality. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Maryam. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I can offer 1,300 Euro per month. This is a good price for the location and the quality of the apartment.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: That's still not high enough for me. I believe the apartment is worth more. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: As a newly built apartment in the city center, 1,300 Euro per month is a fair price. I can assure you that this is the lowest price I can offer.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I appreciate your offer, but I believe the apartment is worth more. Let's negotiate further.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point of view, but as I said before, this is the lowest price I can offer for this apartment. I can't go any higher.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because you are not willing to offer a higher price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand, Maryam. Let's terminate the negotiation.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
